name: Challenge Me: Brain Puzzles 2
summary: Challenge yourself with loads more brain boggling puzzles! Features: * 7 great games including Sudoku, Towers, Number Soup & Squares * Most puzzles generated from new each time you start a new game meaning endless possibilities! * Track your progess in Challenge Mode, where a bar diagram keeps track on your scores & progress * With 4 profiles available there are enough save slots for the whole family!
